response.overview: A film about the natural energy of a person, about the beauty and benefits of sports, a film about synchronization with music, about common sense, about overcoming all barriers on the way to your dream, about daily training of your body and spirit, about willpower, about strengthening your immunity, about developing and improving your skills, about daily improvement, about controlling your thoughts, a film about a clear view of humanity, a film about the value of what surrounds you, a film about a free lifestyle, about a good mood, about a clearer understanding of your aspirations and goals, a film about the source of your inspiration.
response.title: Juniors
